name: Mission B
description: Your objective is to survive and find the way out of the alien ship, Aztec cave and other secret locations, which you will have to visit to complete the Mission B. This game is the combination of arkanoid and first person shooter, built in the Virtual Reality to offer the new level of immersion and unique gaming experience for all arkanoid and shooters fans. Mission B requires you to stay extremely focused, make quick decisions and continuously master your skills. Enjoy Mission B and get ready for new levels, which are coming soon!
